title: Macrium Reflect Workstation - Server - Server Plus v6.1.1000
description:
Macrium Reflect Workstation - Server - Server Plus v6.1.1000

Comparision between Workstation, Server and Server Plus:      
http://s19.postimg.org/u0wsw2lgj/Macrium_Reflect_Comparision.png
.
.
.
.
.
How To:
1. Install Macrium Reflect x86 for 32 bit operating system and x64 for 64 bit operating system
2. Copy the path file (x86 for 32bit version and x64 for 64bit version) to the installed folder
3. Patch and it's done
NOTE: Please block the application from connecting to the internet using a firewall, preventing issues with the crack.
.
.
.
.
.
What's New 6.1.1000

    SQL Restore to original/different location
    A new option has been added to SQL Restore to improve the process of restoring to either original or alternate locations.

Bug Fixes

    Backup Shutdown Issue
    A rare timing issue could cause a crash when Windows shutdown was invoked at the end of a backup. This has been resolved.
    Rescue Media NVMe Issue
    Attempting to use an NVMe device in PE 10 could cause driver detection issues during rescue media creation. This has been resolved.
    Problem burning to optical media when multiple optical drives detected
    When burning to optical media, if multiple DVD drives are detected, then the dialog to choose then next destination for spanned discs could prevent selection of the original drive. This has been resolved
